content.rendered:
FALL BEAUTY PREP

It’s almost time for cozy sweaters, pumpkin spice lattes, and a new beauty routine. I love adding a darker berry or mauve matte lipstick and lipliner like the one from D’Lashes.com. Changing your perfume can also add a little happy pick me up for the new season. I’m loving the new YSL perfume as well as the artistic bottle design.

If Summer has your hair looking dry and brittle, Olaplex just released a new product called Olaplex bonding oil to get your hair looking and feeling healthy again. It’s available on olaplex.com and in Sephora stores. I can’t wait to try it!

Fall look is from FWRD.COM with a beautiful plaid sweater. I know plaid is always on trend for Fall but this season it will be even more popular so sock up!

Top cosmetic bag is from OFF-WHITE and it’s available on FWRD.COM. Bold large print logos and slogans are all over the runways and look very sleek and modern.

Top lashes are the instagram famouce D’Lashes reusable lash strips. And my favorite eyeshadow is also from D’lashes.com/shop.

P.S. Don’t forget to book those lash extensions appointments for Labor Day weekend! I also have a new lash expert technician joining the D’Lashes family for all your lash needs. For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
